str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A sharer, partner, companion. From koinos; a sharer, i.e. Associate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I take to myself, (b) I take aside, (c) I welcome. From pros and lambano; to take to oneself, i.e. Use, lead, admit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
